name: cassie-project
description: Community Activity and Service System for Inclusive Engagement

scripts.install-all: cd cassie-frontend && npm install && cd ../cassie-backend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd cassie-backend && npm start" "cd cassie-frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd cassie-frontend && npm test" "cd cassie-backend && npm test"
scripts.deploy: cd cassie-frontend && npm run build && gh-pages -d build
